text: Russia national volleyball team is the national volleyball team of Russia. The team's best achievements are the four Gold Medal olympic in (1964, 1968, 1980, 2012) and six Gold Medal world championship in (1949, 1952, 1960, 1962, 1978, 1982). == Honors == * Olympics: Gold medal (1964, 1968, 1980, 2012) * World Championship: Gold medal (1949, 1952, 1960, 1962, 1978, 1982) * World Cup: Gold medal (1965, 1977, 1981, 1991, 1999, 2011) * World League: Gold medal (2002, 2013, 2013) == References == * www.russiavolley.com - Russia Volleyball Federation (RUSV) Category:National volleyball teams Category:Sports organizations of Russia
title: Russia men's national volleyball team
